Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at North/Clybourn
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at North/Clybourn due to a medical emergency on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at North/Clybourn due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
